name: FlappyBlock
description:
Welcome to my new game called Flappyblock.  It is kinda like Flappybird except with bad graphics and a block instead of a bird. There won't be a block in its more developed stages, I just wanted to get the prototype out there for testing to see if you like the coin and weird additions to it. 

Controls are simple:

Space to jump and R to restart - that is all you really need to know.

If you want to see this game get better, consider leaving a comment to encourage me. I often give up because of the lack of encouragement so if you want to help me even more  please consider given me a few cents. It is not much but it will be the only way to trick my brain into thinking that I could make a living off of programming games.

If you have downloaded the game, thanks :).
